statements: SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_id = 1;
SELECT prediction, market_outcome FROM predictions WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, payout_distribution FROM predictions ORDER BY prediction_id DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction, market_outcome FROM predictions WHERE user_id = 3 AND market_outcome = 'positive';
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE prediction_id = 1;
SELECT prediction, market_outcome FROM predictions WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM predictions WHERE market_outcome = 'Success' AND user_id = 5;
SELECT prediction, COUNT(prediction) AS prediction_count FROM predictions GROUP BY prediction;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(prediction) AS total_predictions FROM predictions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(prediction) > 3;
SELECT * FROM UserPredictions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_value FROM UserPredictions WHERE prediction_date = '2022-12-01'
SELECT user_id, prediction_id, prediction_value FROM UserPredictions ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM MarketOutcomes WHERE outcome_id = 3
SELECT market_id, outcome_value FROM MarketOutcomes ORDER BY outcome_value ASC
SELECT user_id, prediction_id, prediction_value FROM UserPredictions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_value, prediction_date FROM UserPredictions ORDER BY prediction_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, prediction_value FROM UserPredictions WHERE prediction_value > 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserPredictions WHERE user_id = 1 AND prediction_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, prediction_id, MAX(prediction_value) AS max_prediction_value FROM UserPredictions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserPredictions;
SELECT user_id, prediction FROM UserPredictions ORDER BY prediction_time DESC;
SELECT outcome, market_time FROM MarketOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'win';
SELECT user_id, SUM(payout_amount) as total_payout FROM PayoutDistributions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT prediction, COUNT(*) as prediction_count FROM UserPredictions GROUP BY prediction ORDER BY prediction_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM UserPredictions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT prediction, prediction_time FROM UserPredictions WHERE prediction LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT user_id, MAX(prediction_time) AS latest_prediction_time FROM UserPredictions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS prediction_count FROM UserPredictions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM PayoutDistributions WHERE payout_amount >= 100 AND payout_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM user_predictions;
SELECT user_id, prediction_value, prediction_date FROM user_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, market_id, prediction_value FROM user_predictions WHERE prediction_value > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, SUM(prediction_value) as total_prediction_value FROM user_predictions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT u.user_name, p.market_id, o.outcome_value FROM users u JOIN user_predictions p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN market_outcomes o ON p.market_id = o.market_id;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users WHERE user_balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_name LIKE 'J%' AND user_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT user_name, user_email, user_balance FROM users JOIN user_predictions ON users.user_id = user_predictions.user_id WHERE user_predictions.prediction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_balance ASC;

SELECT users.user_name, market_id, prediction_value FROM user_predictions JOIN market_outcomes ON user_predictions.market_id = market_outcomes.market_id WHERE prediction_value > outcome_value ORDER BY prediction_value DESC;
SELECT u.user_name, pd.payout_amount FROM users u JOIN payout_distributions pd ON u.user_id = pd.user_id WHERE pd.payout_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY pd.payout_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM Users WHERE user_name = 'Alice';
SELECT market_name, market_description FROM Markets WHERE market_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT prediction_text, prediction_date FROM Predictions WHERE prediction_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PayoutDistributions WHERE payout_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Predictions;
SELECT prediction_text, prediction_date FROM Predictions ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;

SELECT Users.user_name, Predictions.prediction_text, Markets.market_name FROM Users JOIN Predictions ON Users.user_id = Predictions.user_id JOIN Markets ON Markets.market_id = Predictions.user_id ORDER BY Markets.market_end_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(prediction_id) as num_predictions FROM Users JOIN Predictions ON Users.user_id = Predictions.user_id GROUP BY user_name HAVING COUNT(prediction_id) > 5;

SELECT Markets.market_name, AVG(payout_amount) as avg_payout FROM Markets JOIN MarketOutcomes ON Markets.market_id = MarketOutcomes.market_id JOIN PayoutDistributions ON MarketOutcomes.outcome_id = PayoutDistributions.prediction_id GROUP BY Markets.market_name HAVING AVG(payout_amount) > 1000;
